behaviorVariationId.Wiki: Behavior that this weapon can use, must match variationId in BehaviorParam_Pc

sortId.Wiki: Position of this weapon in your inventory

wanderingEquipId.Wiki: If your character becomes a wandering ghost this weapon will be replaced with the weapon referenced here

weaponWeightRate.Wiki: Determines what cancel frames can be used while using this weapon

fixPrice.Wiki: Amount of Souls required to repair this weapon

reinforcePrice.Wiki: Souls required to upgrade the weapon

sellValue.Wiki: Souls you will recieve when this weapon is sold

physGuardCutRate.Wiki: Percentage of physical damage this weapon can block

magGuardCutRate.Wiki: Percentage of magic damage this weapon can block

fireGuardCutRate.Wiki: Percentage of fire damage this weapon can block

thunGuardCutRate.Wiki: Percentage of lightning damage this weapon can block

spEffectBehaviorId0.Wiki: Applies speffect when this weapon hits another character

spEffectBehaviorId1.Wiki: Applies speffect when this weapon hits another character

spEffectBehaviorId2.Wiki: Applies speffect when this weapon hits another character

residentSpEffectId.Wiki: Applies this speffect to the player when this weapon is equipped

residentSpEffectId2.Wiki: Applies this speffect to the player when this weapon is equipped

materialSetId.Wiki: Materials used to obtain this item in a shop

weakA_DamageRate.Wiki: Multiplies this weapons damage against Npc's with isWeakA enabled

weakB_DamageRate.Wiki: Multiplies this weapons damage against Npc's with isWeakB enabled

weakC_DamageRate.Wiki: Multiplies this weapons damage against Npc's with isWeakC enabled

weakD_DamageRate.Wiki: Multiplies this weapons damage against Npc's with isWeakD enabled

equipModelId.Wiki: Model used when the weapon is equipped

attackThrowEscape.Wiki: Basic value of throwing attack power

parryDamageLife.Wiki: Limits the lifespan of parry damage. It will not last longer than set in TimeAct.

saDurability.Wiki: Additional SA durability used during attack motions

guardAngle.Wiki: Defense generation range angle when guarding a weapon

staminaGuardDef.Wiki: Percentage of stamina damage that can be blocked with this weapon

bowDistRate.Wiki: Amount of range to add the weapons base range

wepmotionCategory.Wiki: Detemines what set of animations this weapon will use

guardmotionCategory.Wiki: Determines what set of guard animations this weapon will use

correctType_Physics.Wiki: Defines the scaling curve for physical damage

spAtkcategory.Wiki: Overwrites default wepMotionCategory animations with ones in this TAE group

attackBaseParry.Wiki: Basic value to defeat the enemy's parry

defenseBaseParry.Wiki: Used to determine whether to parry or guard when determining a parry.

guardBaseRepel.Wiki: Used to determine whether or not you will be repelled when attacking a guard enemy.

attackBaseRepel.Wiki: Used to determine whether or not it will bounce when guarding against an enemy attack.

guardCutCancelRate.Wiki: Multiplier that nullifies the opponent's guard cut. -100 completely disables. 100 doubles the opponent's defense effect.

guardLevel.Wiki: When guarding, which guard motion will you use to receive the enemy's attack?

slashGuardCutRate.Wiki: Percentage of slash damage this weapon can block

lightHitGuardCutRate.Wiki: Percentage of light hit damage this weapon can block

thrustGuardCutRate.Wiki: Percentage of thrust damage this weapon can block

poisonGuardResist.Wiki: Percentage of Poison build-up that this weapon can block

diseaseGuardResist.Wiki: Percentage of Terror build-up that this weapon can block

bloodGuardResist.Wiki: Percentage of Burn build-up that this weapon can block

curseGuardResist.Wiki: Percentage of Enfeeble build-up that this weapon can block

isDurabilityDivergence.Wiki: Compatible with magic weapons: Motion branching based on durability

rightHandEquipable.Wiki: Can this weapon be equipped in the right hand?

leftHandEquipable.Wiki: Can this weapon be equipped in the left hand?

bothHandEquipable.Wiki: Can this weapon be equipped in both hands?

arrowSlotEquipable.Wiki: Can this weapon be equipped in an arrow slot?

boltSlotEquipable.Wiki: Can this weapon be equipped in a bolt slot?

enableGuard.Wiki: Guard with L1 when equipped with left hand

enableParry.Wiki: Parry with L2 when equipped with left hand

isNormalAttackType.Wiki: Standard damage type display in the weapon menu

isBlowAttackType.Wiki: Blunt damage type display in the weapon menu

isSlashAttackType.Wiki: Slash damage type display in the weapon menu

isThrustAttackType.Wiki: Thrust damage type display in the weapon menu

isEnhance.Wiki: Can this weapon be buffed with speffect?

isHeroPointCorrect.Wiki: Will this weapon's damage be adjusted based on the amount of hero points (humanity/insight) you have?

isCustom.Wiki: It will be listed in the list of reinforcement targets at the reinforcement shop

simpleModelForDlc.Wiki: Is there a simple model for DLC?

baseChangeCategory.Wiki: Determines what affinity/infusion icon will display with the icon

isDragonSlayer.Wiki: Is this a Dragon Slaying weapon?

isDeposit.Wiki: Can this weapon be put in storage?

disableMultiDropShare.Wiki: Can drop this weapon during multiplayer?

isNoticeLog.Wiki: When the weapon is obtained a UI indicater will appear above the Sen counter on the right hand side of the screen, does not pause gameplay

isNoticeDialog.Wiki: When the weapon is obtaines a UI indicator will appear in the middle of the screen, pauses gameplay

staminaJustGuardDef.Wiki: Percentage of stamina damage that can be deflected with this weapon

absorpParamId.Wiki: Id of weapon adsorption position parameter. This value determines the position where the weapon will stick (-1: refer to the value directly written in the old source code)

isAutoEquip.Wiki: Will this weapon be equipped automatically when it is obtained?

isEnableEmergencyStep.Wiki: Is it a weapon that can be avoided in an emergency? Pass to behavior script

correctType_Magic.Wiki: Defines the scaling curve for magic damage

correctType_Fire.Wiki: Defines the scaling curve for fire damage

correctType_Thunder.Wiki: Defines the scaling curve for lightning damage

weakE_DamageRate.Wiki: Multiplies this weapons damage against Npc's with isWeakE enabled

weakF_DamageRate.Wiki: Multiplies this weapons damage against Npc's with isWeakF enabled

darkGuardCutRate.Wiki: Percentage of dark damage this weapon can block

correctType_Dark.Wiki: Defines the scaling curve for dark damage

correctType_Poison.Wiki: Defines the scaling curve for Poison build-up

correctType_Blood.Wiki: Defines the scaling curve for Burn build-up

freezeGuardResist.Wiki: Percentage of Shock build-up this weapon can block

arrowBoltEquipId.Wiki: Model used for displaying arrows in the quiver

resourceItemC.Wiki: Amount of Resource Item C consumed by this weapon (Unused Emblem)

actionUnlockParamId.Wiki: When this weapon is in your inventory the action referenced here will be enabled. If the weapon is removed the action referenced will be disabled
